metadata.title: CVE-2021-28994 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: kopano-ical (formerly zarafa-ical) in Kopano Groupware Core through 8.7.16,9.x through 9.1.0, 10.x through 10.0.7, and 11.x through 11.0.1 and Zarafa6.30.x through 7.2.x allows memory exhaustion via long HTTP headers.

criterions.comment: kopanocore package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
